GameConditionDef.label: Controlled death pall resurrection
GameConditionDef.description: The dead will rise...For your side that is.

GameConditionDef.label: Void Storm
GameConditionDef.description: The Void is filled with strange patterns of psychic energy, affecting creatures inside it in many ways.
